sections.title: Individual Subscriptions to
paragraphs: Computational Linguistics are available only with membership in the Association for Computational Linguistics (ACL). Annual Membership Dues are as follows: regular, $50.00; student -- taking a full-time program of courses and not earning a regular income, $30.00; retired, $30.00; joint -- for couples receiving one subscription, $60.00. A membership application together with an order form for back issues and conference proceedings is included at the end of this issue. Send membership applications and address changes to Priscilla Rasmussen, Association for Computational Linguistics (ACL), P.O. Box 6090, Somerset, NJ 08875, USA. However, note that it is also possible to pay by credit card (both by e-mail and by postal mail) and through banks in Switzerland and Japan.
